title: Bug 4329: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329: When searching via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are found.
OB: When searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog, the search initializes the Search dialog with the fully qualified name. However, this search does not return any results.
EB: When searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog, the search should first try to get the Java element. If that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open the Package view
2. Select a package
3. Right-click and choose the 'Search' option
4. In the Search dialog, enter a search term
5. Click the 'Search' button

Expected behavior:
The search should display results for the entered search term in the Package view.

Notes:
